name: ByPass (fajrthegod)
description:
first person platformer neon with a range of three-dimensional movements exploited, obstacles to be avoided as well as a speed of movement which increases during the levels.
Team : 
Artists : Fajr Kawakibi, Xavier Gappe, Alexandre Bellanger, Oscar Durand.
Devs : Jérémy Ferreira, Dimitri Kapris, Fabrice Copinet.
